title: Recycled Google Pixel Phone for the Verizon network.
content:
Hello.
How to distinguish a new Google Pixel phone from a restored phone purchased on eBay? Vendor sells the Google Pixel phone as new and unlocked, designed for the Verizon network. The unlocked phone from the Verizon network was purchased on Ebay at: https: //www.ebay.com/itm/264323291134? Ul_noapp = true.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
